nodes.text: Arlem Demonhunter was a Black Sun starfighter ace during the Galactic Civil War. Circa 1 ABY, Demonhunter was a hero of the Blacksun and rumored to have taken on a whole Car'das fleet single-handedly. Nevertheless, Demonhunter was killed in the Bright Jewel Ribbon during the Battle of Tansarii Point Station by Aleas Rans'ery's Car'das forces.
